extension.name: Events Booking - Move Registrants
extension.author: Tuan Pham Ngoc
extension.description: This plugin is to move users from waiting list into EB registrants. Only works for free events (as paid events need to be paid before users can become registrants)

field.name: show_on_frontend
field.label: Show On Frontend
field.description: If set to Yes, this plugin will be available on frontend event submission form

field.name: move_registrant_status
field.label: Move Registrant Status
field.description: Choose status of the registrant when they are being moved from Waiting List to Registrants
